2.「ケガを負って 帰って以来| ずっと 村王の熱が下がらなかったのだが| さきほど:
Ever since he returned home after being|injured, the village king's fever had been|persistent, but just now he finally lost|
|consciousness...

9.「お前だけが 頼りなのだ！| そう言わずに もう一度 考え直してくれ！: You're the only one I can count on! You're the|only one I can count on!

15.「ならば ここに来ている場合ではない！| 解熱薬の材料を 急いで 集めてきてくれ: Then this is no time to be here! Hurry up and|get me the ingredients for the antipyretic!

16.「どうだ！| 解熱薬の材料は 手に入ったか！: How's it going? You got the stuff for the|antipyretic!

But I know that he is a kind person from the|bottom of his heart. I think there must be a|good reason why he does not say much at this|
|time...

26.「やめんかっ！ 村王は お休み中だ！: Stop it! The Village King is on vacation!

27.「た 大変なんです！！: I'm so sorry, but I'm in trouble!

28.「何事だ。| つまらんことだったら 承知せんぞ。: What is this? I'll be damned if it's something|trivial.

29.「む 村の武闘場に| 見たことのないヤツが 入り込んできて| 占拠してるんです！: I've never seen anyone like him before! He has|entered the Village Arena and is occupying it!

30.「で そいつは 自分のことを| 死神だとか 言ってやがるんです！: And he's calling himself a Reaper or|something!

32.「それは 確かに ただごとではないな。| 村王が このようなときに| 村を 襲っ: That is certainly not a free-for-all. That the|Village King would attack a village at a time|like this...

33.「<pc>よ！| すまないが 武闘場の様子を| 見にいってくれ！: <pc>! I'm sorry, but I need you to go|check on the fighting field!

34.「味方が増えるのは ありがたい！| 一緒に 行きましょう！: Thank God we have more allies! Come on, let's|go!

35.「<pc>っ！| 私は 村王のそばから 離れられん！: <pc>! I cannot leave the Village|King's side!

36.「武闘場の様子を 見にいってくれ！| 頼れるのは お前だけだ！ 頼むぞ！: Go and check on the battlefield! You're the|only one I can count on! Please!

38.「強さこそ至上と唱えた ランガーオ村とは| とても思えぬ 歯ごたえのなさだ。: It is hard to believe that Langao Village,|which advocated the supremacy of strength, was|so toothless.

40.「ランガーオ村の 愚民どもに告ぐ！| オレは 今から この村を 滅ぼす！！: To the fools of Langao Village! I will now|destroy this village!

41.「不意打ちのような ひきょうなマネはしない。| 戦う意志のあるやつは| 全員 相: We will not be so cowardly as to take you by|surprise. Anyone who is willing to fight, we|will fight!

42.「さあ 好きなタイミングで かかってこい！| 束になってきても 構わんぞ！！: Come at me when you want! I don't care if you|come in a bunch!

43.「やれやれ。どうやら 今| この村にいるのは 戦う勇気さえも失った| 情けないオ: Oh dear. It seems that the only people in this|village now are pathetic ogres who have lost|the courage to even fight.

44.「ならば こっちも遠慮はせん。| 端から順番に 殺していってやろう。| 命乞いし: Then we won't hold back either. We'll kill|them one by one. Those who want to beg for|their lives, scream as loud as you can.

45.「き き 貴様ぁ！| 次は…… 次は オ オレが相手だ！: You, you! Next time... next time, it'll be me!

46.「よし。それでこそ| ランガーオ村の 勇気あるオーガだ。| 次に死ぬのは お前に: Good. That's the brave Ogre of Langao Village.|The next one to die will be you.

48.「ギュランよ……。すまんな。| ここからは ひとりで行く。: Guran... I'm sorry. I'll go alone from here.

50.「……ガガイよ。| 今 この村には お前に勝てるような| 強いオーガは ひとりも: ...Gagai. There is not a single ogre in this|village strong enough to defeat you right|now...

51.「……だが わしは この村の王だ。| たとえ どんなことをしてでも| 村の者を: But I am the king of this village. I must|protect the people of this village no matter|what it takes.

52.「これが 今の わしにできる すべてだ。: This is all I can do right now.

53.「この通りだ。頼む……。| この村の者を 殺さないでくれ……。| わしの命ならば: As you see. Please don't kill anyone from this|village and I'll give you my life as much as|you want.

55.「見るがいい ランガーオ村の者たちよ！| これが 貴様らが 村王などと呼び| 崇: Behold, the men of Langao Village! This is the|true form of the man you call your village|king!

56.「つい先日のことだ。| この男は オレとの真剣勝負に敗れた。| 今も そのキズで:
It was just the other day. This man lost a|serious fight with me. Even now, he seems to|be unable to move with satisfaction due to|
|that scar.

57.「この男は 敗者だ！| 貴様らは それを知っても この男を| 同じように 村王と: This man is a loser! And you know it, but you|can continue to call him the Village King just|the same!

59.「そうだよっ！ 村王は 村王だもん！| 勝者とか敗者とか そんなのカンケーないよ: That's right! The Village King is the Village|King! Winners and losers don't matter!

60.「この村に お前の居場所は なーいっ！| 早々に 立ち去れい！: You have no place in this village! Now, get|out of here!

64.「変わったなど オレは認めんっ！！| 貴様ら 皆殺しにしてやるっ！！: I don't accept that you've changed! I will|kill you all!

65.「<cs_pchero>っ！ 村王を！| 村王を お守りしてくれっ！！: <cs_pchero>! The village king! Protect the|village king!

67.「今度こそ ガガイを倒し 村王を……| いや この村を 守ってくれっ！！: This time, you must defeat Gagai and protect|the village king... or rather, this village!

68.「何度やっても 同じことだ！| この村のやつらは ひとり残らず| 殺してやるっ！: It's the same thing over and over again! I'll|kill every last one of you in this village!

70.「……これが 神の意志だというのか。| 親子二代に渡り 同じ場所で| 同じ屈辱に: ...that this is the will of God. For two|generations, father and son, to die in the|same place, covered in the same humiliation...

72.「お前たちが 父と母にしたのと同じように| 敗れた弱者を さげすみながら| オレ: You can kill me, just as you did your father|and mother, while belittling the weak and|defeated!

74.「どっちも サイコーに かっけーぜっ！| オイラ チョーあこがれちまうぜーっ！: They're both so cool! I'm so hot for you guys!

75.「見てくれ ガガイ。| このランガーオ村は 変わったのだ。: Look at this, Gagai. This Langao Village has|changed.

76.「死への恐怖に打ち勝ち 勇気を持って| 戦った両者を 等しく敬え。| それが 今: Honor equally both those who overcame their|fear of death and fought bravely. That is the|current teaching of this village.

77.「お前が 村を出ていってから| ２０年かけて…… この教えを| 村の皆に 行きわ: I have spent the last 20 years since you left|the village spreading this teaching to|everyone in the village.

|Gagabes, which is still being used as a|memorial.

|village.
